name: Zombie Apocalypse (itch) (GuildGames)
description:
Zombie Apocalypse is about the story of a young girl who is fighting zombies to defend her home.

Defend your home against the zombies in the graveyard.

New Features:
● Boss Level
● Awesome Power ups

Classic Features:
● shoot down multiple zombies
● Test your survival skills
● Test your patience levels as the enemies just won't let up
● Defend yourself with many cool weapons
● Fight against the alpha zombie
and Lots More
